verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Monday] , [ARG0: The New York Times] [V: published] [ARG1: a bombshell report about the questions Special Counsel Robert Mueller wanted to ask President Trump as part of his ongoing Russia investigation] .

On Monday , The New York Times published a bombshell report about the questions [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [V: wanted] [ARG1: to ask President Trump] [ARGM-PRP: as part of his ongoing Russia investigation] .

On Monday , The New York Times published a bombshell report about [ARG1: the questions] [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] wanted to [V: ask] [ARG2: President Trump] as part of his ongoing Russia investigation .
